channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023090686
item.description:
Report X-2023090686

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-01
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-RAYED SHIPMENT. SAW AN OUTLINE THAT APPEARED TO BE BULLETS. PERFORMED PHYSICAL SEARCH AND CONFIRMED THERE WERE BULLETS IN ONE PIECE OF THE SHIPMENT.

item.title: Report X-2023090228
item.description:
Report X-2023090228

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-02
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE DIVERS DIRECT SCUBA TANK WEIGHING 48 POUNDS THAT WAS RELEASING AIR. THE CYLINDER IS PACKAGED IN AN OUTER FIBERBOARD BOX LABELED FRAGILE AND HEAVY WITHOUT ANY DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS. THE TYPE OF TANK IS AN ABER FX133 STEEL CYLINDER 3442 PSI 133 CF.

item.title: Report X-2023090169
item.description:
Report X-2023090169

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-01
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE ANCHORAGE ALASKA FACILITY, THE BOTTOM OF A PACKAGE BECAME SOAKED WITH RAINWATER. DURING PACKAGE REWRAP ONE OF THE INNER BOXES INSIDE THE UNMARKED BOX HAD A GROUND LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING IMPRINTED ON IT. INNER CONTENT INSPECTION REVEALED 24 BOXES OF RX ONLY DICLOFENAC SODIUM TOPICAL GEL REGULATED IN TRANSPORTATION. THE OTHER INNER BOX CONTAINED AMLODIPINE BESYLATE TABLETS THAT ARE NOT REGULATED IN TRANSPORTATION. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2023090441
item.description:
Report X-2023090441

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN ANCHORAGE, ALASKA, A PACKAGE DESTINED FOR EXPORT TO HONG KONG SAR, CHINA WAS FOUND TO CONTAIN DANGEROUS GOODS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THREE EXTRICARE 3000 NEGATIVE PRESSURE WOUND THERAPY SYSTEMS CONTAINING RECHARGEABLE LITHIUM-ION BATTERIES. THERE ARE ADDITIONAL UNREGULATED MEDICAL SUPPLIES PACKED WITH THE DEVICES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2023090229
item.description:
Report X-2023090229

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: FAIRBANKS
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN ALAKSA A PACKAGE SHIPPED AS GROUND SERVICE TO ALASKA FROM THE LOWER 48 STATES WAS FOUND LEAKING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS, WE DISCOVERED TWO CANS OF FLAMMABLE CARBOZINC 8701 PART A AND PART B, AND ONE CONTAINER OF FLAMMABLE POLANE EXTERIOR CATALYST V66 V 55. THE CARBOZINC 8701 PART A PRODUCT WAS DENTED AND PRODUCT WAS LEAKING FROM THE LID. THE POLANE EXTERIOR CATALYST WAS ALSO DENTED BUT DID NOT LEAK. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE FLAMMABLE PRODUCTS WERE BEING SHIPPED.
